segments.text: Observing this, the kitchen feels lived-in and warm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman in apron, focused on the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet's betrayal with that overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's ignoring the puddle at her toes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids sneaking cookies, classic childhood rebellion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's reach is bold, stool teetering.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand in jar, other with plateâ€”clever but scary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost taste those cookies myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mess on the floor is gross, slick and shiny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If they slip, it'll be tears all around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside garden looks perfect, no worries there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This contrast makes the inside hazards pop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hoping no one gets hurt in this tale.
segments.speaker: PAR
